Message.Title: Shorts are playing DELL like they played RIMM a few weeks ago....
Message.Msg: With the exact same doom and gloom nonsense and drove RIMM to $6.22.... It is now up 50% trading around $9.50 and that DELL is a much bigger company, more diversified and with a much stronger balance sheet.... Windows 8 and our Tablets would turn things around and as the IT spending takes off after 4 years of decline, we would be trading around $20 much sooner than the shorts can say cover!

Message.Title: TTNP Filed a Priority Review NDA for the Huge Opiate Addiction Market
Message.Msg: Over 14M individuals are addicted to pain meds and illicit drugs. TTNP ha a 6 month, slow release, abuse proof medication. A Big Pharma partnership or buyout is expected any day. Check it out.

Message.Title: Dell is a good buy
Message.Msg: It isn't sexy. But at a PE of 5 you get your money back in 5 years. DELL will buy back half the shares between now and 2018 if the stock stays down. At a PE of 5 they can actually buy back stock faster than the sales of PCs are declining. So as to keep earnings from falling. Makes sense to me anyway.

Message.Title: Wow, DELL has a bunch of new and exciting XPS tablets.
Message.Msg: Yeah, like who cares. This company may have turned out its last piece of crap and not a minute too soon. Nobody wants tablets and nobody wants another version of Windows. This is a double yawn fest. Jeeeezus.
